scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.assets.config.js --mode=production & webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production & webpack --config webpack.appinsights.config.js --mode=production
scripts.build:watch: webpack --config webpack.assets.config.js --mode=development --watch & webpack --config webpack.config.js --watch --mode=development & webpack --config webpack.appinsights.config.js --watch --mode=development
